name: Weapon wheel (Shooting range)
description:
Weapon wheel is a small proof of concept I made in UE4 centred around reinventing how players switch weapons! The basic concept is that the player has a rotisserie frame that they can slot multiple weapons into. 

The models for the Shotgun, RPG and Rocket were all made by Joseph Garricks!

ArtStation Link: https://www.artstation.com/fatal_maya_error
